ygData.msgSnippet: Welcome back, Crow Lord. Here s a summary of what happened since you left: Megs left the Militron base, Zardus arrived there, and also welcomed Panzertron to

Welcome back, Crow Lord. Here's a summary of what happened since you left:

Megs left the Militron base, Zardus arrived there, and also welcomed 
Panzertron to the planet.

The Alliance kidnapped Iron Raptor and Tavatron. They (IR and Tav) are 
currently in the proccess of being rescued.

The Newcomers attacked the Ark. The Maximals singlehandedly fought them back. 
It was the first time a full scale assault from the Newcomers had been fought 
back by one faction alone.

A few Preds attacked the Cybertronian Fire, and got their butts kicked. 
Followed the Predacon attack, the Newcomers also attacked. During that 
attack, Hell Beast and co. decided to join the battle, helping the Newcomers. 
Once again, the Preds were fought back, not even scratching the ship, even 
after a foiled attempt by Megatron to destroy the Ark to make the Maximals 
surrender. The Newcomers are still there, getting whooped on.
